data.title: Jason Richardson
data.meta_description: Jason Anthoney Richardson (born January 20, 1981) is an American former professional basketball player in the NBA at Shooting Guard for the Orlando Magic. NBA 2K13 Richardson is rated 68 on Offense, and 75 on Defense. His overall rating is an 69. Orlando Magic (2013) Profile on Basketball Wiki
data.text:
Jason Anthoney Richardson (born January 20, 1981) is an American former professional basketball player in the NBA at Shooting Guard for the Orlando Magic.

Appearances[]

NBA 2K13

Statistics[]

NBA 2K13[]

Richardson is rated 68 on Offense, and 75 on Defense.

His overall rating is an 69.
